borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p style="background-color: rgb(229, 229, 229);"><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="font-size: 10.5pt;">&nbsp;The proposed development results in more than 50% of external amenity space being covered by the existing outbuilding and the proposed rear extension. This is not considered to result in a reasonable amount of external amenity space maintained by the dwelling .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span>As such, the proposed development is contrary to:</p><p style="background-color: rgb(229, 229, 229);"><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="font-size: 10.5pt;"><br></span></p><p style="background-color: rgb(229, 229, 229);"><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="font-size: 10.5pt;">National Planning Policy Framework&nbsp;</span>National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (DLUHC, 2021)<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="background-color: rgb(229, 229, 229);"><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 14.98px;">- Policy D4 of the London Plan (March 2021)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p style="background-color: rgb(229, 229, 229);"><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="font-size: 10.5pt;">- Policy CP3 of the&nbsp;</span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010)<o:p></o:p></p><p style="background-color: rgb(229, 229, 229);"><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="font-size: 10.5pt;">- Policies BP5 of the&nbsp;</span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="background-color: rgb(229, 229, 229);"><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 14.98px;">- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="background-color: rgb(229, 229, 229);"></p><p style="background-color: rgb(229, 229, 229);"><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="font-size: 10.5pt;">- Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of&nbsp;</span>The London Borough of Barking and Dagenhamâ€™s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)</p>
description: Construction of a single storey rear extension
